title: League wont start after champ select
body: When champ select ends it just cuts to black and i cant move my mouse or do anything i have to turn off my computer (Mac BTW) and this hasn't been happening until two days ago pls send help

replies.body: Hey, I've seen some reports about this and it might be caused by a popup reconnect notice failing to take priority on the client.  Test it in a custom game first, but try tapping Enter after you leave champion select to command the client to reconnect you to the game.  Let me know if that helps.
Same problem, cant play a game, lost 3 match in row cuz cant start... how to fix it?

PLEASE FIX THIS ISSUE VERY ANNOYING AND NO ONE CONTACTS YOU BACK WHEN YOU REPORT A BUG!! Reported a bug 3 times because of this issue. Now I have 5 20 min queue bans because of it.     
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

same. and every time I try something to fix it I have to wait 20 more min just to see if my fix worked and if it didn't work I get longer wait times because I dc after champ select.  It will only reconnect after the team FFs the match and then it shows up fine.
